LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_TO_WORLDS_END_DESCRIPTI: Cities do not incur war weariness. All military units heal completely when this player captures a city with a world wonder.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_KANDAKE_OF_MEROE_DESCRI: +20% [ICON_Production] Production towards all districts rising to +40% if there is a Nubian Pyramid adjacent to the City Center.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_HOLY_ROMAN_EMPEROR_DESC: Additional Military policy slot. +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking city-states.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_FLYING_SQUADRON_DESCRIP: Has 1 level of [ICON_VisLimited] Diplomatic Visibility greater than normal with every civilization that she's met. Receives a free Spy (and extra spy capacity) with the Castles technology. All spies start as Agents with a free promotion.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_ARTHASHASTRA_DESCRIPTIO: Can declare a War of Territorial Expansion after gaining the Military Training Civic.  +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for the first 10 turns after declaring a War of Territorial Expansion.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_MEDITERRANEAN_EXPANSION: Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to other civilizations provide +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Egypt. Other civilizations' [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to Egypt provide +2 [ICON_Food] Food for them and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Egypt. Trading with Allies earns twice as many bonus Alliance Points.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_FALL_BABYLON_EXPANSION2: +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for the first 10 turns after declaring a Surprise War on a major civilization. +5 Loyalty per turn in occupied cities with a garrisoned unit. Declaring a Surprise War only counts as a Formal War for the purposes of [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances and warmongering.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_FOUNDER_CARTHAGE_DESCRI: Can move their capital to any city with a Cothon they founded by completing a unique project in that city. +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity for each Government Plaza building and the Government Plaza district. +50% [ICON_Production] Production toward districts in the city with the Government Plaza.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_ELEANOR_LOYALTY_DESCRIP: Great Works in Eleanor’s cities each cause -1 Loyalty per turn in foreign cities within 9 tiles. A city that leaves another civilization due to a loss of Loyalty and is currently receiving the most Loyalty per turn from Eleanor's civilization skips the Free City step to join this civilization.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_SATYAGRAHA_DESCRIPTION: +5 [ICON_Faith] Faith for each civilization (including India) they have met that has founded a Religion and is not currently at war. Opposing civilizations receive double the war weariness for fighting against Gandhi.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_GENGHIS_KHAN_ABILITY_DE: All cavalry class units gain +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength and a chance to capture defeated enemy cavalry class units.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_ADVENTURES_ENKIDU_EXPAN: When at war with a common foe, they and their allies share pillage rewards and share combat experience gains if within 5 tiles. Their Alliances gain Alliance Points for being at war with a common foe.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_EXALTED_GODDESS_NAME: Exalted Goddess of the Three Worlds
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_EXALTED_GODDESS_DESCRIP: Naval units can be purchased with [ICON_FAITH] Faith. Religious units pay no movement to embark or disembark. +2[ICON_FAITH] Faith to City Centers that are adjacent to Coast or Lake tiles.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_THERMOPYLAE_DESCRIPTION: Combat victories provide [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to 50% of the [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength of the defeated unit.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_THUNDERBOLT_EXPANSION2_: Allows coastal raiding for all naval melee units and +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production toward all naval melee units. Receive [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from pillaging and coastal raiding Mines in addition to [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Pillaging or coastal raiding Quarries, Pastures, Plantations, and Camps provide [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in addition to [ICON_FAITH] Faith. Gain the Viking Longship unique unit with Sailing.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_DIVINE_WIND_EXPANSION2_: Land units receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in land tiles adjacent to Coast; naval units receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in shallow water tiles. Builds Encampment, Holy Site and Theater Square districts in half the time. Units do not receive damage from Hurricanes. Civilizations that are at war with Japan receive +100% unit damage from Hurricanes in Japanese territory.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_LITHUANIAN_UNION_DESCRI: The Religion founded by Poland becomes the majority in an adjacent city that loses a tile to a Polish Culture Bomb. Holy Sites gain standard Faith adjacency bonus from adjacent districts. All Relics provide bonus Faith (+2), Culture (+2) and Gold (+4).
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_MONASTERIES_KING_DESCRI: Holy Sites provide +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing if placed on a river. Holy Sites trigger a Culture Bomb.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_CITADEL_CIVILIZATION_DE: +100% [ICON_Production] Production if either they have received a declaration of war in the past 10 turns or if they have liberated a city in the past 20 turns.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_KRISTINA_AUTO_THEME_DES: Buildings with at least three Great Work slots and wonders with at least two Great Work slots are automatically themed when they have all their slots filled. She may construct the Queen's Bibliotheque in the Government Plaza.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_KUPES_VOYAGE_DESCRIPTIO: Begin the game in an Ocean tile. Gain a free Builder and +1 [ICON_Citizen] Population when settling your first city. The Palace receives +3 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing and +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity. +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture per turn before you settle your first city.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_LAST_BEST_WEST_DESCRIPT: Allows Farms to be built on Tundra terrain. After Civil Engineering is unlocked Farms can be built on Tundra Hills. In Snow, Tundra, Snow Hills, and Tundra Hills all Mines provide +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and strategic resource accumulation rate is +100%. Reduces the purchase cost of tiles in these terrain types by 50%.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_LAUTARO_ABILITY_DESCRIP: If a Mapuche Unit defeats an enemy unit within the borders of the enemy city, that city loses 20 Loyalty. Pillaging a plot in an enemy city causes it to lose 5 loyalty.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_SAHEL_MERCHANTS_DESCRIP: International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for every flat Desert tile in the origin city. Receive +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Capacity every time you enter a Golden Age.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_RAVEN_KING_DESCRIPTION: Levied units gain an ability giving them +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. It cost 75% less [ICON_GOLD] Gold and resources to upgrade Levied units. If you Levy troops from a City-State receive 2 [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys with that City-State. Gain the Black Army unique unit when the Castles technology is researched.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_GIFTS_FOR_TLATOANI_DESC: Luxury resources in his territory provide an [ICON_Amenities] Amenity to 2 extra cities. Military units receive +1 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking for each different Luxury resource improved in Aztec lands.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_RELIGIOUS_CONVERT_DESCR: May not build Holy Site districts, gain Great Prophets, or found Religions. Gains all Beliefs of any Religion that has established itself in a majority of his cities. Receives an Apostle each time he finishes a M'banza or Theater Square district (of that city's majority Religion).
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_PACHACUTI_QHAPAQ_NAN_DE: Domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +1 [ICON_Food] Food for every Mountain tile in the origin city. Gain the Qhapaq Ñan improvement when Foreign Trade civic is discovered.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_MAGNANIMOUS_DESCRIPTION: After recruiting or patronizing a [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person, 20% of its [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person point cost is refunded.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_SURROUNDED_BY_GLORY_DES: +5% [ICON_Culture] Culture per city-state you are the Suzerain of.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_GRAND_EMBASSY_DESCRIPTI: Receives [ICON_Science] Science or [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to civilizations that are more advanced than Russia (+1 per 3 technologies or civics ahead).
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_EL_ESCORIAL_EXPANSION2_: Inquisitors can Remove Heresy one extra time. Inquisitors eliminate 100% of the presence of other Religions. Combat units have a bonus of +4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against players following other Religions.
LOC_LEADER_POUNDMAKER_ABILITY_DESCRIPTIO: All Alliance types provide Shared Visibility.[NEWLINE]Your outgoing [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes grant +1 [ICON_Food] Food to Poundmaker per Camp or Pasture at the destination. [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes sent to your cities grant +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold to Poundmaker per Camp or Pasture at the destination.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_FIRST_EMPEROR_EXPANSION: When building Ancient and Classical wonders you may spend Builder charges to complete 15% of the original wonder cost. Builders receive an additional charge. Canals are unlocked with the Masonry technology.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_BANNOCKBURN_DESCRIPTION: Can declare a War of Liberation after gaining the Defensive Tactics Civic.  +100% [ICON_Production] Production and +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for the first 10 turns after declaring a War of Liberation.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_RIGHTEOUSNESS_OF_FAITH_: The worship building for their Religion can be purchased by any player for just one-tenth of the usual  [ICON_Faith] Faith cost.  This worship building is enhanced to add 10% to the [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Faith] Faith, and [ICON_Culture] Culture output of Arabian cities.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_HWARANG_DESCRIPTION: [ICON_Governor] Governors established in a city provide +3% [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Science] Science for each Promotion they have earned, including their first.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_AMABUTHO_DESCRIPTION: May form Corps (Mercenaries Civic) and Armies (Nationalism Civic) earlier. An additional +5 [ICON_STRENGTH] Base Combat Strength to both Corps and Armies.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_SULEIMAN_GOVERNOR_DESCR: Exclusive unique Governor with military and diplomatic abilities. Gain the Janissary unique unit when the Gunpowder technology is researched.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_RELIGION_CITY_STATES_NA: Glory of the World, Kingdom and Faith
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_RELIGION_CITY_STATES_DE: +100% [ICON_FAITH] Faith for 10 turns after declaring a Protectorate War. Each [ICON_ENVOY] Envoy you send to a city-state of your majority Religion counts as two [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys. (Must have a majority Religion).
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_KILLER_OF_CYRUS_DESCRIP: All units receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking wounded units. When they eliminate a unit, they heal up to 30 hit points.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_TRAJANS_COLUMN_DESCRIPT: All cities start with an additional City Center building. (Starts with a Monument building in the Ancient era).
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_ROOSEVELT_COROLLARY_DES: Units receive a +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength on their home continent. +1 Appeal to all tiles in a city with a National Park. Gain the Rough Rider unique unit when they research the Rifling technology.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_PAX_BRITANNICA_EX: Each time you found your first city on a continent other than your home continent receive a free melee unit and a trade route capacity. Constructing any Royal Navy Dockyard grants you a copy of the strongest naval unit you can build. Gain the Redcoat unique unit when the Military Science technology is researched.
LOC_TRAIT_RADIO_ORANJE_DESCRIPTION: Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to your own cities provide +1 Loyalty per turn for the starting city. [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to foreign cities or from foreign cities provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture to you.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_FOUNDING_FATHERS_: All Diplomatic policy slots in the current government are converted to Wildcard slots. +1 [ICON_FAVOR] Diplomatic Favor per turn for every Wildcard slot in their government.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_LAST_PROPHET_DESC: Automatically receive the final [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet when the next-to-last one is claimed (if you have not earned a [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet already). +1 [ICON_Science] Science for each foreign city following Arabia's Religion.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_LAND_DOWN_UNDER_D: +3 [ICON_Housing] Housing in coastal cities. Pastures trigger a Culture Bomb. Yields from Campuses, Commercial Hubs, Holy Sites and Theater Squares are +1 in tiles with Charming Appeal, +3 in Breathtaking.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_LEGEND_FIVE_SUNS_: Spend Builder charges to complete 20% of the original district cost.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_AMAZON_DESCRIPTIO: Rainforest tiles provide +1 adjacency bonus for Campus, Commercial Hub, Holy Site, and Theater Square districts. Rainforest tiles provide +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing for Neighborhoods built adjacent to them.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_FACES_OF_PEACE_DE: Cannot declare war on City-States or surprise wars. Surprise wars cannot be declared on Canada. For every 100 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism per turn earn 1 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor per turn. Receive +100% [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor from successfully completing an Emergency or Scored Competition.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_DYNASTIC_CYCLE_EX: [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspirations provide 50% of civics and technologies instead of 40%.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_CREE_TRADE_GAIN_T: +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity and a free Trader with the Pottery technology. Unclaimed tiles within 3 tiles of a Cree city come under Cree control when a Trader first moves into them.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_ITERU_EXPANSION2_: +15% [ICON_Production] Production towards districts and wonders if placed next to a River. Does not receive damage from Floods.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_UNIT_EGYPTIAN_CHA: Egyptian unique unit: Maryannu Chariot Archer
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_INDUSTRIAL_REVOLU: Iron and Coal Mines accumulate 1 more resource per turn. +100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards Military Engineers. Military Engineers receive +2 charges. Buildings that provide additional yields when [ICON_POWER] Powered receive +2 of that yield.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_ROYAL_NAVY_DOCKYA: English unique district: Royal Navy Dockyard
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_WONDER_TOURISM_DE: +20% [ICON_Production] Production toward Medieval, Renaissance, and Industrial era wonders. [ICON_Tourism] Tourism from wonders of any era is +100%.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_GOLDEN_AGE_QUESTS: When making Dedications at the beginning of a Golden Age or Heroic Age, receive the Normal Age bonus towards improving Era Score in addition to the other bonus.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_IMPERIAL_FREE_CIT: Each city can build one more district than usual (exceeding the normal limit based on [ICON_Citizen] Population).
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_PLATOS_REPUBLIC_D: One extra Wildcard policy slot in any government.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_PEARL_DANUBE_DESC: +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to Districts and Buildings constructed across a river from a City Center.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_GREAT_MOUNTAINS_D: Citizens may work Mountain tiles. Mountain tiles provide +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food to Mountain tiles for every adjacent Terrace Farm.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_DHARMA_EXPANSION2: Receives Follower Belief bonuses in a city from each Religion that has at least 1 Follower. Cities gain an [ICON_Amenities] Amenity for every Religion with at least 1 Follower. Missionaries have +2 spreads. +100% Religious pressure from your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_INDONESIA_NUSANTA: Coast and Lake tiles provide a minor adjacency bonus for Holy Site, Campus, Industrial Zone, and Theater Square districts. +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity from entertainment to each Entertainment Complex adjacent to a Coast or Lake tile.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_ADJACENT_DISTRICT: All districts receive an additional standard adjacency bonus for being adjacent to another district.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_KHMER_BARAYS_DESC: +3 [ICON_FAITH] Faith and +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity from entertainment to each city with an Aqueduct. Farms provide +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food if adjacent to an Aqueduct.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_NKISI_DESCRIPTION: +2 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Production] Production, and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold from each [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic, [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifact, and Sculpture [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Great Work of Art in addition to the usual [ICON_Culture] Culture. Receive 50% more [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician, and [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant points. Palace has slots for 5 Great Works.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_THREE_KINGDOMS_DE: Mines receive +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science if there is an adjacent Seowon district. Farms receive +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food if there is an adjacent Seowon district.
LOC_BUILDING_BASILIKOI_PAIDES_DESCRIPTIO: A building unique to Macedon.+25% combat experience for all melee, ranged land units, and Hetairoi trained in this city. Gain [ICON_SCIENCE] Science equal to 25% of the unit's cost when a non civilian unit is created in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Stable.
LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_HELLENISTIC_FUSION_DESC: Receive boosts upon city conquest: a [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka for each Encampment or Campus in the conquered city and an [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration for each Holy Site or Theater Square.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_MALI_GOLD_DESERT_: City Centers gain +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith and +1 [ICON_FOOD] for every adjacent Desert and Desert Hills tiles. Mines receive -1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. May purchase Commercial Hub district buildings with [ICON_Faith] Faith. -30% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production toward constructing buildings or training units.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_MAORI_MANA_DESCRI: Begin the game with the Sailing and Shipbuilding technologies unlocked and with the ability to enter Ocean tiles. Embarked units gain +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement. Unimproved Woods and Rainforest are +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, becoming +2 once the Conservation civic is unlocked. Fishing Boats provide +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and a Culture Bomb to adjacent tiles. Resources cannot be harvested. [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writers cannot be earned.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_MAPUCHE_TOQUI_DES: All units trained in cities with an established [ICON_Governor] Governor gain 25% more experience in combat. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength bonus against civilizations that are in a Golden Age.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_MONGOLIAN_ORTOO_D: Starting a [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route immediately creates a [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Post in the destination city. Receive an extra level of [ICON_VisLimited] Diplomatic Visibility for possessing a [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Post in any city of a civilization. All Mongolian units double the usual [ICON_Strength] Combat Bonus for having a higher level of [ICON_VisLimited] Diplomatic Visibility than their opponent.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_GROTE_RIVIEREN_EX: Major adjacency bonus for Campuses, Theater Squares, and Industrial Zones if next to a river. Culture Bomb adjacent tiles when completing a Harbor. +50% [ICON_Production] Production toward the Dam district and Flood Barrier building.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_EARLY_OCEAN_NAVIG: Units gain the ability to enter Ocean tiles after researching the Shipbuilding technology. Naval melee units heal in neutral territory. Units ignore additional [ICON_Movement] Movement costs from embarking and disembarking.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_TA_SETI_DESCRIPTI: +50% [ICON_Production] Production toward Ranged units. All Ranged units gain +50% combat experience. Mines over strategic resources provide +1 [ICON_Production] Production. Mines over bonus and luxury resources provide +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_GREAT_TURKISH_BOM: +50% [ICON_Production] Production toward siege units. All siege units gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against district defenses. Conquered cities do not lose [ICON_Citizen] Population. Cities not founded by the Ottomans gain +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity and +4 Loyalty per turn.
LOC_IMPROVEMENT_PAIRIDAEZA_DESCRIPTION: Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Pairidaeza, unique to Persia.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. +2 Appeal. +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each adjacent Holy Site and Theater Square. +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each adjacent Commercial Hub and City Center. Additional [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism as you advance through the Technology and Civics Tree. Cannot be built on Snow, Tundra, Snow Hills, or Tundra Hills or adjacent to another Pairidaeza.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_SATRAPIES_DESCRIP: +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity with Political Philosophy civic. Receive +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for routes between your own cities. Roads built in your territory are one level more advanced than usual.
LOC_UNIT_PERSIAN_IMMORTAL_DESCRIPTION: Persian unique melee unit that replaces the Swordsman. Melee class unit with a ranged attack, [ICON_Range] Range 2. Strong defense strength.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_MEDITERRANEAN_COL: Begin the game with the Writing technology [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka. Coastal cities founded by Phoenicia and located on the same continent as the Phoenician [ICON_Capital] Capital are 100% Loyal. Settlers gain +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +2 sight range while embarked. Settlers ignore additional [ICON_Movement] Movement costs from embarking and disembarking.
LOC_BUILDING_SUKIENNICE_DESCRIPTION: A building unique to Poland. International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes from this city gain +2 [ICON_Production] Production; domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_GOLDEN_LIBERTY_DE: Culture Bomb adjacent tiles when completing an Encampment or Fort inside friendly territory. One Military policy slot in the current government is converted to a Wildcard slot.
LOC_UNIT_POLISH_HUSSAR_DESCRIPTION: Polish unique Medieval era unit. Pushes defending enemy units back from their hex in any battle where they score more damage. Defenders that cannot retreat suffer additional damage.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_ALL_ROADS_TO_ROME: All cities you found or conquer start with a Trading Post. If in [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route range of your [ICON_Capital] Capital, they also start with a road to it. Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes earn +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for passing through Trading Posts in your own cities.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_MOTHER_RUSSIA_EXP: Extra territory upon founding cities. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +1 [ICON_Production] Production from Tundra. Units do not receive damage from Blizzards. Civilizations that are at war with Russia receive +100% unit damage from Blizzards in Russian territory.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_SCOTTISH_ENLIGHTE: Happy cities receive an additional +5%  [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +5%  [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. Happy cities generate +1  [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist point per Campus and +1 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer point per Industrial Zone. Ecstatic cities double all these amounts.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_EXTRA_LIGHT_CAVAL: Receive a second light cavalry unit or Saka Horse Archer each time you train a light cavalry unit or Saka Horse Archer.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_UNIT_SCYTHIAN_HOR: Scythian unique unit: Saka Horse Archer
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_TREASURE_FLEET_EX: May form Fleets and Armadas earlier than usual (Mercantilism). [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes between multiple continents receive bonus [ICON_Gold] Gold for routes to other civilizations, and bonus [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Production] Production for routes between your own cities. +2 Loyalty per turn for cities with a Mission improvement adjacent to the City Center and not on your original [ICON_Capital] Capital's continent.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_FIRST_CIVILIZATIO: When you capture a Barbarian Outpost, receive a Tribal Village reward in addition to the usual [ICON_Gold] Gold. Pay half the usual cost to levy city-state units.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_NOBEL_PRIZE_DESCR: Sweden gains 50 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor when earning a Great Person (on Standard Speed). Sweden receives +1 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer point from Factories and +1 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist point from Universities. Having Sweden in the game adds three unique World Congress competitions starting in the Industrial Era.
LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_ZULU_ISIBONGO_DES: Cities with a garrisoned unit get +3 Loyalty per turn, or +5 if it is a Corps or Army. Conquering a city with a unit will upgrade it into a Corps or Army, if the proper Civics are unlocked.
